name: Journey To The Inbetween
description:
My submission to the first 8 bits to infinity: Vimjam!

Embark on an adventure where two seemingly unrelated individuals swap places in the fabric of space and time. In order to do so they must cross 'The Inbetween'

Controls:

WASD to control character

SPACE BAR to switch character

W to climb

Yes i know the controls aren't what you're used to,

i wanted to stand out from the crowd!

Hope you all enjoy and best of luck in the jam!
